talk.chat:
Collector Marsha:
Starstones... known amongst the wizards as nebulite... A very rare mineral indeed! It comes to us upon meteorites.
It was much more common in ancient times. Titans used it as a power source for their fantastic machines.
Return

Collector Marsha:
Merciful heavens, you startled me! How did you sneak up on me like that?!
Anyway, it's nice to meet you! I am Collector Marsha, an expert in exotic substances. I am here searching for Starstones. I had no idea this place was so dangerous! Earlier I was nearly killed, and now I fear for my older brother!
Ask about Starstones
"Tell me about your brother."
Quest

Collector Marsha:
My older brother Trumpin is also a collector. He is very diligent and capable, although he does have a weakness for games of chance. I have watched him gamble away all his savings.
Actually I saw him not too long ago. We were running away from monster eyes and became separated. He must still be somewhere in this crater...
Return
